title: Safety in the mountains: snowcraft
creator_credit: John Cooper, Grahame MacFarlane and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: Outlines the major points to remember in mountain craft; the preliminary climb and how and when to use the rope; climbing on soft snow and hard snow, step-cutting, use of crampons and general uphill and downhill movement.
